/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the overcast sky. On the right side of the street, there's a yellow building with a red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. The left side of the street features a gray building with a blue roof, complementing the yellow building. The street itself is marked with yellow and white lines, guiding the way for vehicles. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, connecting two parts of the city. The image captures the essence of urban life in Beijing, with its blend of natural and man-made elements.
